channel.title: Go on Fill the memory
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Fill the memory

item.title: Generate godoc for pkg with generics
item.description: Go 1.18 is here with the addition of the generics. This is like the biggest change to the language since version 1 and consequently it has many impacts to the tooling around the code. One of these impacts is the godoc command deprecation replaced by the command pkgsite. When you create your own pkg, and you want to test your godoc locally you have first to build pkgsite git clone https://go.
